item.title: ‘Coyote vs. Acme’ Director, ‘Scott Pilgrim Takes Off’ Creator’s ‘Hex’ Lands at 20th Century (Exclusive)
item.description: Dave Green is attached to direct what will be a script by BenDavid Grabinski.
